media.headline: Reynolds' solo home run
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds opens scoring with a solo home run
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds crushes a solo home run to right-center field to give the Rockies a 1-0 lead in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Broxton hit in the face by pitch
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Broxton exits after being HPB in the face
media.bigblurb: Keon Broxton is replaced by Kirk Nieuwenhuis after being hit in the face by a pitch from Antonio Senzatela

media.headline: Anderson deflects ball for out
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Anderson kicks ball to Villar, robs LeMahieu
media.bigblurb: DJ LeMahieu hits a sharp grounder that deflects off the foot of Chase Anderson and bounces right in front of Jonathan Villar for the out

media.headline: Nieuwenhuis' solo homer
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Nieuwenhuis ties game with a solo home run
media.bigblurb: Kirk Nieuwenhuis launches a solo shot over the right-center-field wall to tie the game at 1 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Reynolds' diving catch
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds robs Bandy with stunning catch
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds lays out to catch a sharp line drive off the bat of Jett Bandy for the second out in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Parra not HBP after challenge
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Parra confirmed to not get HBP after review
media.bigblurb: The Rockies challenge that Gerardo Parra is hit by a pitch, and after review the call is confirmed that he was not hit

media.headline: Arenado's go-ahead homer in 9th
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arenado drills go-ahead solo shot in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado crushes a solo home run over the left-center-field wall to put the Rockies ahead 2-1 in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Holland locks down the save
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Holland gets Braun to fly out to end game
media.bigblurb: Greg Holland forces Ryan Braun to fly out to right field, completing a 1-2-3 9th inning to seal the Rockies' win and notch the save

media.headline: Senzatela induces double play
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Senzatela escapes bases-loaded jam with DP
media.bigblurb: Antonio Senzatela gets out of a bases-loaded jam by forcing Domingo Santana to ground into an inning-ending double play in the 1st

media.headline: Reynolds starts double play
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds snags sharp grounder to start DP
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds fields a sharp grounder hit by Travis Shaw, then quickly throws to second to start a double play in the bottom of the 6th

media.headline: Senzatela K's six in MLB debut
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Senzatela fans six in strong MLB debut
media.bigblurb: Antonio Senzatela allows only two hits and three walks with six strikeouts over five strong innings in his Major League debut

media.headline: Reynolds dazzles with bat, glove
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds homers, makes great diving grab
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds crushes a solo home run in the top of the 3rd and makes a spectacular catch in the bottom of the 7th in the Rockies' 2-1 win

media.headline: Counsell on loss to Rockies
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Counsell on pitching, Broxton's Injury
media.bigblurb: Brewers manager Craig Counsell discusses Chase Anderson's solid performance, the Rockies' late home run & Keon Broxton's injury in the loss

media.headline: Anderson's one-run outing
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Anderson fans four, holds Rockies to one run
media.bigblurb: Chase Anderson records four strikeouts in six innings of work and gives up only one run in his no-decision against the Rockies

media.headline: Recap: COL 2, MIL 1
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Arenado's late home run lifts Rockies to win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Mark Reynolds and Nolan Arenado each clubbed a home run while Antonio Senzatela fanned six over five in his Major League debut

media.headline: Broxton on being hit by pitch
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Broxton on being hit in the helmet by pitch
media.bigblurb: Keon Broxton talks about being hit by a 93-mph fastball by Rockies pitcher Antonio Senzatela and how he avoided serious injury

media.headline: Black on Rockies' 2-1 victory
media.blurb: COL@MIN: Black on Senzatela, Arenado in 2-1 win
media.bigblurb: Rockies manager Bud Black discusses Antonio Senzatela's strong outing in his MLB debut and Nolan Arenado's go-ahead homer in the 9th
